content:
HelloWorld详解代码
1234567891011121314151617using System;														//从名称空间中引用到程序里面，using关键字为引用，后面为名称空间using System.Collections.Generic;using System.Linq;using System.Text;using System.Threading.Tasks;namespace ConsoleApp1				//名称空间{    class Program					//类    {        static void Main(string[] args)        {            Console.WriteLine("HelloWorld");		//WriteLine也是类，作用为输出，Console也是类来自名称空间System        }    }}

title: Shigure
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server1$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files1$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
